languages.text: "Вы выбирали между голодной смертью и посягательством на десятину. Это будет учтено при вынесении приговора как смягчающее обстоятельство".
"Your choice was between starving to death and desecrating the tithe. This mitigating circumstance will be taken into account during your sentencing."
languages.original_text: "Вы выбирали между голодной смертью и посягательством на десятину. Это будет учтено при вынесении приговора как смягчающее обстоятельство".

traits.locale_text: "Your choice was between starving to death and desecrating the tithe. That mitigating circumstance will be taken into account during your sentencing."
"Your choice was between starving to death and desecrating the tithe. That mitigating circumstance will be taken into account during your sentencing."
"Your choice was between starving to death and desecrating the tithe. That mitigating circumstance will be taken into account during your sentencing."

"Your choice was between starving to death and desecrating the tithe. This mitigating circumstance will be taken into account during your sentencing."

languages.text: «Sus opciones eran morir de hambre o profanar el diezmo. Este atenuante se tendrá en cuenta en la sentencia».
languages.original_text: "Your choice was between starving to death and desecrating the tithe. This mitigating circumstance will be taken into account during your sentencing."

traits.locale_text: «Sus opciones eran morir de hambre o profanar el diezmo. Este atenuante se tendrá en cuenta en la sentencia».

languages.text: “你们当时别无选择，要么饿死，要么亵渎什一税。在审判过程中，我们会酌情考虑当时的情况，减轻你的刑罚。”
languages.original_text: "Your choice was between starving to death and desecrating the tithe. This mitigating circumstance will be taken into account during your sentencing."

traits.locale_text: “你们当时别无选择，要么饿死，要么亵渎什一税。在审判过程中，我们会酌情考虑当时的情况，减轻你的刑罚。”

languages.text: 「お前の選択は餓死するか、租税を汚すかのどちらかだった。この減刑されるべき状況は判決時に考慮されるだろう」
languages.original_text: "Your choice was between starving to death and desecrating the tithe. This mitigating circumstance will be taken into account during your sentencing."

traits.locale_text: 「お前の選択は餓死するか、租税を汚すかのどちらかだった。この減刑されるべき状況は判決時に考慮されるだろう」

languages.text: « Autrement dit, vous aviez le choix entre mourir de faim et profaner la dîme. Cette circonstance atténuante sera prise en considération lors de votre jugement. »
languages.original_text: "Your choice was between starving to death and desecrating the tithe. This mitigating circumstance will be taken into account during your sentencing."

traits.locale_text: « Autrement dit, vous aviez le choix entre mourir de faim et profaner la dîme. Cette circonstance atténuante sera prise en considération lors de votre jugement. »

languages.text: "Açlıktan ölmekle aşarın kutsallığın halel getirmek arasında kalmışsınız. Bu hafifletici sebep, hüküm verilirken dikkate alınacaktır."
languages.original_text: "Your choice was between starving to death and desecrating the tithe. This mitigating circumstance will be taken into account during your sentencing."

traits.locale_text: "Açlıktan ölmekle aşarın kutsallığın halel getirmek arasında kalmışsınız. Bu hafifletici sebep, hüküm verilirken dikkate alınacaktır."

languages.text: "Ihr hattet die Wahl, zu verhungern oder den Titel zu entweihen. Diese mildernden Umstände werden hinsichtlich Eures Strafmaßes berücksichtigt."
languages.original_text: "Your choice was between starving to death and desecrating the tithe. This mitigating circumstance will be taken into account during your sentencing."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr hattet die Wahl, zu verhungern oder den Titel zu entweihen. Diese mildernden Umstände werden hinsichtlich Eures Strafmaßes berücksichtigt."
